dataset.title: GBIF Occurrence Download 10.15468/dl.9k75hy
dataset.abstract: A dataset containing all occurrences available in GBIF matching the query: { "and" : [ "Country is Kazakhstan", "TaxonKey is Acridotheres tristis (Linnaeus, 1766)" ] } The dataset includes records from the following constituent datasets. The full metadata for each constituent is also included in this archive: 2 records from Birds of Northern Eurasia 113 records from Observation.org, Nature data from around the World 1 records from Birds and Mammals Collections of the Zoological Museum of M.V. Lomonosov Moscow State University 112 records from RU-BIRDS.RU, Birds observations database from Russia and neighboring regions. Zoological Museum of M.V. Lomonosov Moscow State University. 1 records from Vertebrates Collection of the Karaganda Buketov University Museum of Nature 1 records from Birda - Global Observation Dataset 2296 records from EOD â€“ eBird Observation Dataset 1 records from Hatikka.fi observations 6 records from NABU|naturgucker 2 records from Xeno-canto - Bird sounds from around the world 1 records from Collection Aves (bird skeletons) SMF 364 records from iNaturalist Research-grade Observations
